languages.text: {n}Ворон останавливает вас оглушающим карканьем. Образы из головы кибербестии встают перед глазами: изрешеченное варп-прорывами пространство впереди, разрушительные потоки энергии. С поддержкой ворона ваших сил хватит, чтобы избавиться от ловушек.{/n}

{n}The raven stops you with deafening croaks. Images from the cyber-beast's head rise before your eyes: the space ahead, riddled with warp breaches; the devastating streams of energy. The raven's support gives you the capability to disarm the traps.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ворон останавливает вас оглушающим карканьем. Образы из головы кибербестии встают перед глазами: изрешеченное варп-прорывами пространство впереди, разрушительные потоки энергии. С поддержкой ворона ваших сил хватит, чтобы избавиться от ловушек.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The raven stops you with deafening croaks. Images from the cyber-beast's head rise before your eyes: the space ahead, riddled with warp breaches; the devastating streams of energy. The raven's support gives you the capability to get rid of the traps.{/n}

{n}The raven stops you with deafening croaks. Images from the cyber-beast's head rise before your eyes: the space ahead, riddled with warp breaches; the devastating streams of energy. The raven's support gives you the capability to get rid of the traps.{/n}

{n}The raven stops you with deafening croaks. Images from the cyber-beast's head rise before your eyes: the space ahead, riddled with warp breaches; the devastating streams of energy. The raven's support gives you the capability to disarm the traps.{/n}

{n}The raven stops you with deafening croaks. Images from the cyber-beast's head rise before your eyes: the space ahead, riddled with warp breaches; the devastating streams of energy. The raven's support gives you the capability to disarm the traps.{/n}

{n}The raven stops you with deafening croaks. Images from the cyber-beast's head rise before your eyes: the space ahead, riddled with warp breaches; the devastating streams of energy. The raven's support gives you the capability to disarm the traps.{/n}

{n}The raven stops you with deafening croaks. Images from the cyber-beast's head rise before your eyes: the space ahead, riddled with warp breaches; the devastating streams of energy. The raven's support gives you the capability to disarm the traps.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Rabe unterbricht dich mit ohrenbetäubendem Krächzen. Bilder aus dem Kopf der Cyber-Bestie erscheinen vor deinem Auge: der Raum vor dir, voller Warprisse, vernichtende Energieströme. Dank der Unterstützung des Raben kannst du die Fallen entschärfen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven stops you with deafening croaks. Images from the cyber-beast's head rise before your eyes: the space ahead, riddled with warp breaches; the devastating streams of energy. The raven's support gives you the capability to disarm the traps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Rabe unterbricht dich mit ohrenbetäubendem Krächzen. Bilder aus dem Kopf der Cyber-Bestie erscheinen vor deinem Auge: der Raum vor dir, voller Warprisse, vernichtende Energieströme. Dank der Unterstützung des Raben kannst du die Fallen entschärfen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La corneille pousse des croassements assourdissants pour vous arrêter, puis vous transmet des images issues de son esprit : la zone devant vous, parsemée de fractures du Warp ; les flux d'énergie dévastateurs. Le soutien de l'oiseau vous permet de désamorcer les pièges.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven stops you with deafening croaks. Images from the cyber-beast's head rise before your eyes: the space ahead, riddled with warp breaches; the devastating streams of energy. The raven's support gives you the capability to disarm the traps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La corneille pousse des croassements assourdissants pour vous arrêter, puis vous transmet des images issues de son esprit : la zone devant vous, parsemée de fractures du Warp ; les flux d'énergie dévastateurs. Le soutien de l'oiseau vous permet de désamorcer les pièges.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的渡鸦发出了震耳欲聋的嘎嘎声，拦住了你前进的脚步。它的头上浮现出了警告图像，显示前方的空间满是亚空间的裂隙，充斥着毁灭性的能量流。不过，你的渡鸦可以帮助你解除陷阱。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven stops you with deafening croaks. Images from the cyber-beast's head rise before your eyes: the space ahead, riddled with warp breaches; the devastating streams of energy. The raven's support gives you the capability to disarm the traps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的渡鸦发出了震耳欲聋的嘎嘎声，拦住了你前进的脚步。它的头上浮现出了警告图像，显示前方的空间满是亚空间的裂隙，充斥着毁灭性的能量流。不过，你的渡鸦可以帮助你解除陷阱。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cuervo te detiene con unos graznidos ensordecedores. Las imágenes de la mente de la ciberbestia aparecen ante tus ojos: el espacio más adelante, cubierto de brechas de la disformidad, y las devastadoras corrientes de energía que lo atraviesan. La ayuda del cuervo te permite desarmar las trampas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven stops you with deafening croaks. Images from the cyber-beast's head rise before your eyes: the space ahead, riddled with warp breaches; the devastating streams of energy. The raven's support gives you the capability to disarm the traps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cuervo te detiene con unos graznidos ensordecedores. Las imágenes de la mente de la ciberbestia aparecen ante tus ojos: el espacio más adelante, cubierto de brechas de la disformidad, y las devastadoras corrientes de energía que lo atraviesan. La ayuda del cuervo te permite desarmar las trampas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}レイヴンは耳をつんざくような鳴き声であなたを止めた。サイバービーストの頭から映像が目の前に浮かび上がる。〈歪み〉の裂け目だらけの先の空間、そして破壊的なエネルギーの流れ。レイヴンの支援により、あなたは罠を解除する能力を得た。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven stops you with deafening croaks. Images from the cyber-beast's head rise before your eyes: the space ahead, riddled with warp breaches; the devastating streams of energy. The raven's support gives you the capability to disarm the traps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}レイヴンは耳をつんざくような鳴き声であなたを止めた。サイバービーストの頭から映像が目の前に浮かび上がる。〈歪み〉の裂け目だらけの先の空間、そして破壊的なエネルギーの流れ。レイヴンの支援により、あなたは罠を解除する能力を得た。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kuzgun, kulakları sağır eden gaklamalarıyla önünü kesiyor. Siber hayvanın zihninden kopan hayaller, gözlerinin önüne dökülüyor: Öteboyut yarıklarıyla delik deşik uzay ve yıkıcı enerji akıntıları. Kuzgunun desteği, tuzakları bertaraf etmen için sana kudret bahşediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven stops you with deafening croaks. Images from the cyber-beast's head rise before your eyes: the space ahead, riddled with warp breaches; the devastating streams of energy. The raven's support gives you the capability to disarm the traps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kuzgun, kulakları sağır eden gaklamalarıyla önünü keser. Siber canavarın zihninden kopan hayaller gözlerinin önüne dökülür: Öteboyut yarıklarıyla delik deşik uzay ve yıkıcı enerji akıntıları. Kuzgunun desteği, tuzakları bertaraf etmen için sana kudret bahşeder.{/n}
